title: Technology-Integrated Instructional Design: Self-Regulated Learning-Based Mobile Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: Process for novice professional learners in managerial/leadership roles to learn technology-integrated instructional design in mobile environments. Operated with a focus on formative assessments, with digital devices provided.

learning_goals: Design technology-integrated social studies lessons with over 80% accuracy using the TPACK (Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge) framework
Complete at least three iterative design feedback cycles in mobile environments by applying self-regulated learning strategies
Identify over 90% of problems occurring in technology-integrated design processes and propose improvements through metacognitive monitoring activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
